thread.title: Watch Migos Go Sneaker Shopping & Reveal Their Love of Air Jordans
thread.title_full: Watch Migos Go Sneaker Shopping & Reveal Their Love of Air Jordans

author: Daniel Pearson
title: Watch Migos Go Sneaker Shopping & Reveal Their Love of Air Jordans
text:
For the latest installment of its Sneaker Shopping series, our friends over at Complex have taken the Georgia trap group Migos for a spot of retail therapy at Flight Club, Los Angeles.
The entertaining clip features all three members — Quavo, Takeoff, and Offset — reminisce about their mutual love of the Air Jordans of their childhood (don’t miss the cute pic of Takeoff and Quavo as young children at 4:27.) Quavo even admits to getting into a fight as a teenager because somebody stood of his fresh pair of Jordans while wearing muddy shoes.
Later in the clip, the trio explains why they love what adidas is doing right now, as well as giving their thoughts on the latest YEEZYs and adidas x Pharrell Human Race NMDs. They finish off by picking up six pairs of — yes, you guess it — Jordans. Check out the clip above.
In other sneaker news, UNDERCOVER and Vault by Vans have finally unveiled their full collab collection .
Subscribe to Highsnobiety’s sneaker chatbot on Facebook to receive lightning quick updates on release dates, sneaker street style, shopping tips and more.
